Detailed Description

A read-only RowVectorAlias class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The RowVectorAliasConstant class provides all the functionality from the MatrixAliasConstant class, but add specific functions intended for row vectors.

Definition at line 1371 of file matrix.h.

RowVectorAliasConstant::RowVectorAliasConstant (  const double *  data,
const unsigned int  size
)  [inline]
 

Default constructor.Pointer constructor.

To create a read-only row vector that will access a pre-available data array.

Parameters:
data Pointer to data array. This will be the data storage for the matrix.
size Number of columns the matrix has.
